name: Koukoku of the Souten Kicks
text: During your opponent's turn, if a face-up "Souten" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, except "Koukoku of the Souten Kicks": You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can destroy 1 "Souten" monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Souten" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Souten" Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Koukoku of the Souten Kicks" once per turn.
